website_summaries.verdict: Just about all the equipment you need to produce your own tasty beer. You'll need to purchase ingredients, bottles, and a 5-gallon (or larger) pot separately.
pros: A fine introduction to the art of beer brewing at home
Clear directions guide you through the process
cons: Some owners complained that the bottling spigot leaked
A few felt the overall quality was not as good as they had hoped

customer_reviews.title: First time brewer
customer_reviews.text: mine didn’t have a syphoning pump just the tube or maybe I’m missing something and need to read directions. Bought a digital thermometer and an extra long stirring spatula. Set the bubbler to the side and rigged up my own to avoid any explosions 🌋😁 the capper, bottle cleaner and bucket and sanitizer were and will be helpful later on. You could prob get away with just buying the things separately as you find you need them which I’m doing anyways but it’s a good easy start. I brewed beer so maybe you use more of the stuff for wine. We will see and update review. Good starter kit though. 4* for now
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Milk dealer

customer_reviews.title: It's the little things that gripe me.
customer_reviews.text: No hole in bucket yet came with spigot. Guess you still the whole yourself. No testing jar for hydrometer so pointless. Ordered a bottling bucket separate let's see if they put a hole in that one. Ordered a test jar from different company. Would have loved to get going with it but no way the way it came this kit was ready.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The carboy is a great quality. Dropped it a few times without it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several years ago and I am still using it. The spigot was drilled into the bucket just perfectly. Sometimes it's put too low and knocks against a flat surface, other times it's too high and you have to tip the buck a lot to get all your brew dispensed. This has not been an issue. The bottle capper has finally broke but this has been after 3 years of use. The carboy is a great quality. Dropped it a few times without it breaking. If you get this for your first kit, it does not come with a handle or harness for the carboy so make sure to get that too.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Love my kit
customer_reviews.text: Love my mead kit, even tho i bought the wrong kit. My fail! A must have for mead making, even though this kit is for beer making. Hence the cap press/sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Irietree

customer_reviews.title: The capper is terrible, everything else is great.
customer_reviews.text: The capper broke on the second use. I was very upset as I was in the middle of bottling a 5 gallon batch.... Everything else seems pretty decent. I would recommend buying an auto-siphon, additionally, as it is much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Zee

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: first time getting this kit so im not sure what it all is but the plastic straw thing that is made out of hard plastic and capped on one end was broken when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: linzie salmons

customer_reviews.title: NonRefundable Broken
customer_reviews.text: The seller will not accept any returns. My equipment arrived broken. I'm out the cash. Very disappointing. I would strongly caution against this product because there's no safety net if your product arrives damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parent

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit as a gift for a new brewer. It took almost 10 months before he used the kit and come to find out we were missing the spigot to the bucket. I emailed the company on friday and recieved the spigot on monday afternoon. Now thats service ! I would recomend this company and will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggersman

customer_reviews.title: Just a seriously solid Homebrew Kit
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. Can't give enough of a good review to express my gratitude and respect for the impact that this kit has had in my world. WARNING: homebrewing is addictive and this kit feeds into that haha!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not great for wine, but is for beer
customer_reviews.text: Great for beer. If you were doing wine, it has many of the same items, but is missing a few key things (test tube for brix checker, corker, suction pump) that were needed, so maybe think about another. Good components though.
customer_reviews.author: weven

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS KIT!
customer_reviews.text: This kit actually comes with a bottling bucket, not a fermenting bucket, no auto syphon just a racking cane that is pretty much useless, and what good is a hydrometer with out a test jar?
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Straw was shattered
customer_reviews.text: The long straw(newbie here) was completely shattered. Great thickness on the 5 gallon jug though.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie H.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional First Time Brewer Kit
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value. The set arrived 4 days after I placed my order. Everything was clean , new, and in excellent condition. I was taken aback by the high quality for such a super reasonable price. They totally blew away my expectations. Again, a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Everything in this kit works as cescribed
customer_reviews.text: You really have everything here to brew beer. The carboy is good quality and so is the bucket. You will do your own research anyway so it doesnt need a detailed brewers manual or anything like that. I dont care for the powder sanitize, but I'm sure it works fine. Get yourself this kit, and a mix that makes 5 gallons of beer and get brewing!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M. Kroon

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I have other equipment already
customer_reviews.text: Incomplete kit. Missing a whole bunch of stuff to be able to brew from start to finish. Good thing I have other equipment already. My advice is to read the 3 star and below reviews to get a better idea of what your getting into
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The one thing this kit is Lacking is the Beer ...
customer_reviews.text: The one thing this kit is Lacking is the Beer Thief which is what you place the Hydrometer in to check the beer at Certain stages.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman076

customer_reviews.title: decent product
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars BUT proof and Traille hydrometer arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner kit comes with everything you will need to get started
customer_reviews.author: Greenie

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t come with the handbook or instructions
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited to get started, my kit did not come with the true brew handbook or the equipment instructions as listed in the product description. Otherwise everything else arrived with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic system to make beer
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived broken because of the shipper fault, but they quickly sent a replacement unit and was worth the wait. Fantastic system to make beer. Everything you need is here.
customer_reviews.author: David Benson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as described. This set is good for beginners and a fun gift to give. Good price for the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this setup
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this setup. Cleans up easily and has made some great brews! I had done small kit extract before this (Mr. Beer) and upgraded to this. Wish I had done so earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I did some research and found that this kit had the best price, and when I signed up for the amazon card they took off $30. On top of that they gave me a promotional $50 gift card for signing up so I only paid @ $7.95 for the whole kit! I have already made one batch of hard cider and it turned out great... thank you!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised I have been looking foreword to brewing for some time now and although I have breed in the past and could have found all these items around the house, but by buying it as a kit every thing was handy and already sterile.
customer_reviews.author: Loclynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister in law to give as a gift, it was a great start for a home brewer, he was very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited for this to arrive, but to my dismay, it came with a broken hydrometer and no bottle filler.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Della Chiesa

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for someone wanting to get into making your ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for someone wanting to get into making your own beer. WONDERFUL carboy and great wide brew bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: 10 batches of beer later I'm still loving it. Good product. Everything you need to start home-brewing. I've done Wine, Beer, Cider and Mead in this kit and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P

customer_reviews.title: Most of the kit is pretty good but they had a massive oversight in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the kit is pretty good but they had a massive oversight in the spigot on the bucket where the end of the spigot is too large for the 3/8th in hose that connects to the siphon valve
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marcoux

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer was broke, it did not come with a 5 gallon carboy....it was only a 3 gallon glass carboy.... the sanitizer was open and spilled in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Bradford

customer_reviews.title: decent but missing a few pieces
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally happy with this kit but it does have a few shortcomings. You'll need to get a vial for the hydrometer that comes with the kit. You'll probably also want to get an auto siphon instead of the one here; it's like $10 and it will save you a lot of hassle. Otherwise you're balancing tubes full of water and trying to maintain sterility without pouring your beer all over the floor.finally, it doesn't come with a brew kettle, so unless you have a 5 gallon stock pot (most people don't) you'll need to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Aerel

customer_reviews.title: good price, goot kit
customer_reviews.text: solid kit, only needs a few extras (a big enough boiling pot, some sanitizer, and the ingredients) to get you ready for brewing straight out of the box. instruction booklet had some conflicting information in it from what i had read in other sources but that aside the equipment has so far met the need. I have already recommended this to a family member
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: For everything you get in this kit, its a great buy. Some great stuff in here. All you will need to get is a kettle, thermometer, bottles and caps. The only issue I had was the rack and fill set is a little flimsy and got stuck a few times while filling bottles. You just have to tap it a few times if that happens.
customer_reviews.author: GIwineGuy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have my first batch clearing in Carnot now love the ease is clean up on Fremont bucket
customer_reviews.author: mike hoots

customer_reviews.title: love it i am now on my 2nd batch of ...
customer_reviews.text: love it i am now on my 2nd batch of beer. there is nothing better then brewing your own beer
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great Kit for beginners. I have actually used this set up twelve times and have found little tricks to enhance the final product. But this is a great starting point. My first try was with an IPA ingredient kit, and it came out fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great setup for the first time brewers out there. This kit comes with everything you need except bottles and caps. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: dmur

customer_reviews.title: it's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and you have to by a couple of things to get it started but the quality and size are top notch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent love it! Fantastic just have one thing left to do: get my brew on
customer_reviews.author: S Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Racking cane included, but go ahead and get an auto siphon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Movitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this kit is almost all you need to start brewing I would recomend it for the new homebrewer
customer_reviews.author: The Tate Blog

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked great and made the process very easy
customer_reviews.text: Just got done making my first batch of wine with this kit. Everything worked great and made the process very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Neroyer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for bro in law's bday. We just used ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for bro in law's bday. We just used to make a blonde and a stout. Had everything we needed accept a long stir spoon
customer_reviews.author: A-A-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Capper is fairly low quality - stopped working reliably after two or three batches.
customer_reviews.author: Stoney

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected came in on time . Definitely a good starter kit. Has all the equipment that you would need except a thermometer. Brewed my first batch of beer now we wait and see
customer_reviews.author: Steven Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit. We made a lot of IPA and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. We made a lot of IPA and it turned out great. It is also fun.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: It is an awesome starter kit for home brewing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. It is an awesome starter kit for home brewing!
customer_reviews.author: Dogzofhell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the hydrometer has no vessel to use it with.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only thing was no bottle caps came with the kit?
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: first brew
customer_reviews.text: bottled my first brew last weekend and I have had no issues with this kit. Everything was delivered in good shape. Nothing was missing or broken. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: agentKnipe

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: Great kit all you need to start. I would suggest a second carboy however, after reading many brew blogs. Racking your beer for clarity seems to be obvious although not necessary. I will buy one, my first beer was a pilsner and needs it.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this kit up for my boyfriend for Christmas and we started brewing right away. It came with pretty much everything we needed. We chose to buy another fermenting bucket and use the carboy as a secondary. I'd recommend this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Boulderta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kit
customer_reviews.text: Brew kit is awesome! I have used it for 2 batches so far. Everything you need to start the wonderful hobby of home brewing!
customer_reviews.author: J Buck

customer_reviews.title: A good kit to get you on your way as a ...
customer_reviews.text: A good kit to get you on your way as a home brewer. First batch of beer has been bottled and the second one was racked today.
customer_reviews.author: cpeders1

customer_reviews.title: Best top of the line stuff
customer_reviews.text: YES YES YES... Everything you need to brew a good batch right here. Don't waste time there is beer to be brewed mann.
customer_reviews.author: Silastees

customer_reviews.title: So far everything is coming along great. First batch is in secondary
customer_reviews.text: Everything needed in one package (OK 2 but you get it). So far everything is coming along great. First batch is in secondary. Can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marvin

customer_reviews.title: As Billed
customer_reviews.text: Already produced about 15 gallons. I would recommend getting the one with auto-siphon and honestly a 6 gallon carboy is a must. But for basics, this is a great kit to start out with.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: fix the description
customer_reviews.text: Title says 5 gallon glass carboy, description says 6 gallon glass carboy....its a 5 gallon...need to get the description right...
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeNovio

customer_reviews.title: Great products.
customer_reviews.text: I am making my first batch of mead. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, great seller.
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains all what you beed to begin brewing, today I'm brewing my second batch of beer and it is amazing, aside from this you will need a stainless steel pot and other common stuff that you will get easily. The hydrometer arrived to me broken(after all is a made from crystal) I noticed the capper was pressed against it, I wrote to the seller and they shipped me a replacement really fast. I'm not a big fan of aging my beer on better bottles, so the glass carboy as a secondary fermenter is ideal for me, also the ease of the plastic bottle when handling the wort is great.
customer_reviews.author: Yoye

customer_reviews.title: some broken in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Glass tubes for transferring were broken. Everything else looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: everything you will need...
customer_reviews.text: I made the first berw and it was very easy and enjoyable, i look forward to tasting it in-till it gone...
customer_reviews.author: chassf218

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this package! The thermometer is garbage, you will have to buy one for you brew. Be careful as the package is packed tight with bubble wrap. When i got my airlock out it was cracked, to be fair i think i heard it crack as i was excitedly ripping through my box like a child. I read about spigot issues with rhe plastic bucket but mine fit like a glove, no leaks. All in all very happy with the package and i would definetly buy here again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Brewers kits
customer_reviews.text: All the products were just as described. I would recommend this starter kit to any new brewer out there .
customer_reviews.author: Jerod potter

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very good products. A piece showed up damaged and they were happy to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Mastercard

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit but could use a 6 gal carboy instead of a 5 to allow room for boil over. Nice
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Almeida

customer_reviews.title: WAY TO GO
customer_reviews.text: THIS KIT WAS EASY AND QUICK, EVERYTHING YOU NEED COMES WITH THIS KIT. EASY STEPS AS 1 2 3 FROM START TO FINISH
customer_reviews.author: Joyce watkins

customer_reviews.title: Not a 6 gal carboy!
customer_reviews.text: Its only a 5 gallon carboy...a little disappointed there. Cant do a 5 gal batch in a 5 gallon carboy. Can use it as a secondary fermenter thats about it. Other than that everything's good. Would give 5 stars if it weren't for the misleading of the carboy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Just bottled my first beer using this kit...excellent kit, glass carboy is awesome. You may want to update the thermometer to a floating one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Toth

customer_reviews.title: Brewing kit
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Shipping from Fedex Was excelant. I'm using them for now on. The only thing it was lacking. Was a auto syphon, Plunger bottle sanitiser,cooking therometer,and a better bottle brush. All I got at my brew shop.
customer_reviews.author: CUZZ

customer_reviews.title: The Kit
customer_reviews.text: Received everything as represented and in new undamaged condition in a timely manner. Suggest adding a funnel to the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: The rigid tube is broken
customer_reviews.text: The rigid tube is broken and I could not use, I think they should pay more attention parcel services they use, never go back to buying a product brand!
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Missing part, no joy.
customer_reviews.text: Kit was missing a piece, so I could fully appreciate it. I would also suggest that beginners make sure to get a wort chiller.
customer_reviews.author: Emory G. Fristoe

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Was not worth the money paid. Learn to Brew is very difficult to work with. Save your money...the product is cheap and bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Skey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product and the quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Girardi

customer_reviews.title: Who drilled this?
customer_reviews.text: Solid kit. However my bottling bucket appears to have been drilled by someone who was not paying attention to what they were doing. There is a gouge on the lip of the drill hole that lets water freely flow from what should be a clean seal. Looks like the drill jumped out of the hole when they were drilling and took a chunk out of the lip and they didn't even bother to pull the bucket from retail rotation.
customer_reviews.author: The D's

customer_reviews.title: Home brew
customer_reviews.text: The kit came on time and as described. Well packaged and looking forward to my first brew for me and my friends
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great kit/ Brewed 6 batches and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brew kit and includes just about everything you need for pretty cheap. If you go to a brew shop you would probably end up spending $400 dollars. Overall can complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Home Brew Ohio RL-WKZ2-0IJS Gold Complete Beer Equipment Kit (K7) with 5 gal Glass Carboy
product_meta.description: Take your homebrew to the next level. The Gold homebrew Kit has all you need to get brewing and adds a glass carboy for secondary fermentation resulting in a cleaner finished brew. Each equipment Kit includes: true brew handbook & Kit Instructions, 7.8 gallon fermenting bucket, 1 Lid drilled & grommet, true brew rack & fill Kit, 5 gallon glass carboy, fermometer fermentation thermometer, small buon vino drilled stopper, hydrometer, bottling Spigot, emily double Lever capper, 3 piece airlock, bottle Brush, c-brite sanitizer 8-pack.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061.
